c74object.name: sdt.spectralfeats~
c74object.digest: Sound analysis: Spectral analyzer, extracting several audio descriptors.
c74object.description:
sdt.spectralfeats~ provides statistical moments of the spectrum and other spectral information. Together with the other audio-feature extractors (sdt.pitch~, sdt.envelope~, sdt.zerox~, and sdt.myo~), sdt.spectralfeats~ is an analysis tool to support the audio-rate control of the sound synthesis models.
The object routes the following features:
* spectral magnitude
* spectral centroid
* spectral spread
* spectral skewness
* spectral kurtosis
* spectral flatness
* spectral flux
* whitened and rectified spectral flux (onset function).
The output is a list of messages in the form a qualified pair, in which the first element is the name of the descriptor and the second element is the corresponding extracted value. To be used with the route object.

outlet.digest: List of messages in the form of a qualified pair - feature, value.

attribute.name: minFreq
attribute.digest: Lower frequency threshold, in Hz (0 for DC).

attribute.name: maxFreq
attribute.digest: Upper frequency threshold, in Hz (0 for Nyquist).
